ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] error numbers
ygData.msgSnippet: 400 is safe as a general client-side error (as is 500 for a general server-side error). Use 400 and give information as to the error in the response body. --

error). Use 400 and give information as to the error in the response body.
